local_intent: Detect red_plate, move above it, lower until contact, open gripper to place, then retreat and wait.
assumptions: Robot currently holds the white_plate after prior pick
Red plate is within reachable workspace
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer/place portion of GLOBAL_BT: perceives red_plate, transits above it, performs compliant lowering until contact, releases (open gripper), then retreats and waits. Uses retries for perception consistent with failure/recovery guidance.
